name: Fisticubes
description:
Fisticubes is a goofy physics-based one-button boxing party game where up to 4 players compete to knock each other into bubbling lava or deep, deep waters!

Enjoy such features as:
  • A growing selection of different arenas!
  • Plenty of match-making options!
  • 2-4 player support with customizable controls!
  • Anvils that destroy the very floor beneath you!
  • Bombs that launch you in any and every direction!
  • Vegetables that make you grow bigger than your enemies!
  • Online multiplayer with Steam's Remote Play Together
    https://store.steampowered.com/remoteplay/#together
  • Colour Blind Accessibility!
  • Bots for offline and friendless play!



Credits:
  • Artwork by Bethany Coyles
  • Music by The Flaming Pike
  • Shaders by Luke Kabat
  • Trailer by Josh Curry-Glasper
